discourse_list.title: EIP0 Summit:  Statement of intent to support Ethereum governance initiatives

content.content: Medium – 11 May 18    EIP0 Summit — Statement of intent to support Ethereum governance initiatives Recently, a number of important governance conversations have developed in the Ethereum community around topics like ASICs resistance, fund… Reading time: 3 min read        The signers of this public statement commit to supporting one or more of the following next steps:  Work on a statement of shared values of Ethereum Support and build open source tools to collect key signals and metrics Host a monthly governance call Organize a second #EIP0 Summit
content.GPT-summary: The post is an explanation of the EIP0 Summit's statement of intent to support Ethereum governance initiatives. The signers of the statement commit to supporting various next steps, including working on a statement of shared values of Ethereum, supporting and building open source tools, hosting a monthly governance call, and organizing a second #EIP0 Summit. The post also mentions important governance conversations in the Ethereum community around topics like ASICs resistance and fund.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
